column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: ------A man died after crashing his car
column7: in front of Toul Kork Market on 289 Street. Sangkat Boeung Kok II
column9: Phnom Penh.------The victim was named as En Sao
column11: from Kampong Cham province.------According to a source in the scene
column12: the car was driving at high speeds
column13: when it hit the road divider
column15: who was not wearing a seatbelt
column16: was thrown from the vehicle and was killed. The car engine then ignited and two fire-fighting units were called to the scene to control the blaze.------Images from the scene:------https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=1762437550549906&id=436017133191961------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E1%9E%98%E1%9F%81%E1%9E%83%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%80%E1%9F%86%E1%9E%96%E1%9E%84%E1%9F%8B%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%82%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%97%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9B%E1%9F%80%E1%9E%84%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%94%E1%9E%BB%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%9F/------ ------
